00033 
00034         public:
00035                 //LP_alsa();

00037                 int lp_alsa_init();
00038                 int lp_alsa_close();

00040                 int nb_max_channel;     // nombre maximum de la carte son
00041

00048                 snd_pcm_sw_params_t *sw_params;

00050                 int dir;                // Pour approcher fech
00051                 int test_hw_params();
00052                 int set_hw_params();
00053                 int set_sw_params();
00054                 int lp_alsa_stop;       // status stop = 1
00055                 pthread_t thread_id;
00056 };
00057 
00058 /* lancement thread Alsa */
00059 /* run the alsa thread */
00060 int lp_alsa_thread_init(pthread_t *thread_id);
00061 
00062 /* attente fin thread Alsa */
00063 /* wait the end of alsa thread and quit */
00064 int lp_alsa_thread_join(pthread_t thread_id);
